title: I am sick to death of Annies BS ult
body:
An ult that is ready every fight and lasts forever. That fucking bear can go and go...and gets out of position, warps away. What this is fucking horseshit? 

Seriously Riot, you really do pick winners and losers in this game.  Fuck off with your BS, always making mage ults more more powerful. I wouldn't be surprised if you buffed Ahri at this point.

replies.body:
Rush a {{item:1057}} or {{item:3155}}  and watch as Annie never kills you in one rotation ever again!

Seriously, if Annie can't one-shot you, she's basically useless.

Sigh. As usual people assume I am complaining about her in lane. I main top. I never lane against her. But what I see is wreckage, and I cant control my teammates. ANY champion can be out played, but that has NOTHING to do with whether or not a champion is OP
